bboxes.raw_text:
RICHMOND, Va. (ANPD =
Virginia's massive school, re-
sistance strategy received
death blow from the five-man
United States Court of Appeals
for the Fourth Circuit. With
Judge Simon E. Sobeloff presid-
ing, the court struck down Vir-
ginia's system of paying tax-fi-
nanced tuition grants to white
students in segregated private
schools in two of its school dis
tricts as ga transparent evasion
of the 18th Amendment" The two
districts affected are Prince Ed
ward and Surrey counties.


Virginia's segregationists are
not expected to appeal the de-
cision. The decision states in
part: "The defendants assert
that injunctions preventing the
use of tuition grants to maintain
a separate school for white pupils
will infringe on the white pupils
right of association

SAGINAW, Mich. = (ANPD =
A young attorney, Henry Marsh,
has been appointed assistant to
the prosecutor of the welfare de-
partment.


Marsh, who is also City
Councilman becomes the first
Negro to serve on the Saginaw
prosecutor S staff.


With the increase of the staff,
Currie also announced he would
recommend elimination of the
position of County civil counsel
because FL feel that this office
will now be able to represent
Saginaw County in all criminal
and civil Matters

Well Folks


Are you ready with the
Christmas Spirits" We at
REDDY'S CORNER are "RED-
DY'' to help you'll


Of course we have our usual
fine selection of beverages, but
above that we were able to get
big shipment of rum and brandy
that we can sell at unbelievably
low prices.


lima CINE a FULL QUART of
RUM Nationally advertised) for
only $500. Half pints as LOW
as 89&.


Now is the time to stock up for
the holidays. We have lot of
merchandise for low prices, how
ever, it can't last very long.


AS Always,


Just Freddy

FORT HUACHUCA Cheryl
Goodwin, l9, daughter of>Lt. Col.
and Mrs. Felix L. Goodwin, Tue
son, Ariz., was awarded Uni
versity Scholarship Honors at a
University of Arizona Honors
Convocation last month.


A senior at the u of A, Cheryrs
scholastic average was IA. She
is majoring in special education.


Her father, a regular Army
officer with Is years service, is
the Information Officer at the
US. Army Electronic Proving
Ground, Fort Huachuca, Ariz. He
is also attending the u of A
after duty hors. He will COM
plete his studies for a masters
degree in public administration
this semester.


Mrs. Goodwin, graduate of
the Atlanta University School for
Social Work, is a social worker
with the Arizona Children's
Home, Tucson. Both she and
Cheryl are members of Alpha
Kappa Alpha sorority. Colonel
Goodwin belongs to Alpha Phi
Alpha Fraternity.


The Goodwin family including
two other children, Sylvia, Is,
and Judy IL, reside in Tucson

Cartwright Jackie Barbara Colbert bridesmaids

girl. Photo Bobby Heard

Defeated
